title: What do you want to know about wireless Android Auto adapters? – Motorola MA1, AAWireless, Carsifi
content:
Wireless Android Auto is incredibly convenient, but it’s still relatively rare to find the feature built into your vehicle. However, a simple wireless Android Auto adapter makes it incredibly easy to add the functionality — what do you still want to know about them?

more…

The post What do you want to know about wireless Android Auto adapters? – Motorola MA1, AAWireless, Carsifi appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A wireless Android Auto adapter is a convenient way to use Google's platform. Here's what you need to know, and which one to buy.
